questionListItems.title: Who can participate in the 2024 Primary One Registration Exercise?

answer.body: Children born between 2 January 2018 and 1 January 2019 (both dates inclusive) can participate in the 2024 Primary One Registration Exercise for admission to Primary One Classes in 2024.

questionListItems.title: How do I register my child for P1 in Anderson Primary School?

answer.body: Parents should refer to the registration phases and procedures to find out which phase their children are eligible for, how to register and the documents required for registration.

questionListItems.title: How many P1 vacancies will be offered by Anderson Primary School?

answer.body: The P1 vacancies for each phase for every primary school will only be made available in June each year before the commencement of the Primary One Registration Exercise.

questionListItems.title: Can I join Anderson Primary School as a Parent Volunteer for priority registration in Phase 2B?

answer.body: In order to be eligible for the Registration in the Phase 2B in the Primary One Registration Exercise, parents must join the school as a Parent Volunteer (PV) at least 1 year before the Registration Exercise and fulfil at least 40 hours of PV service by 30 May before the P1 Registration starts.

questionListItems.title: When is the Primary One Registration Exercise conducted?

answer.body: The Primary One Registration Exercise is conducted from July to August.

questionListItems.title: How do I qualify for priority registration?

answer.body:
Children whose parent or sibling have studied at Anderson Primary School, Ang Mo Kio North Primary School, Li Hua Primary School and Hong Dao Primary School, are eligible for P1 Registration in Phase 2A.

If you have misplaced your report book and PSLE certificate, you can find more information on how to obtain a Statement of Results (SOR) here.
